name: Recyclemania
description:
Use your mouse (or finger) to quickly grab & crush recyclables in this race-against-the-clock!

The more correct crushes you get in a row, the higher your accuracy multiplier will be! Your job performance will be judged with a ranking from F to the illustrious S-Rank!

For mobile, it's highly recommended to switch your screen to Horizontal to make gameplay easier!

Full source code is available to view on github!
